name: RetroShooter
description:
Hey everybody!

So recently I got interested in game Dev so here I am with my first game! It is just a prototype with minimal features but I will continue to take your feedback and add more features to the game!

So they game is a top down shooter game, and it is supposed to have a more retro style to it. Currently there are 3 types of enemies, Normal, strong, and fast. Also yea I know the UI is kinda bad but again it is a work in progress. There is not much to the game yet but I have big plans for the future!

Again, I am very new to game dev as I do not know much but I am still learning. So updates may be slow on this but I will be trying my best!

Have fun!

UPDATE

- Added New enemies

- Added snow and trees

- Added powerups

- Added boss

- Changed menu and UI
